instructions: Go to Settings > Accessibility > VoiceOver. Do any of the following: Add or reorder the rotor settings: Tap Rotor, then choose the settings you want, or drag the Reorder button to reorder settings. Add another language: Tap Speech > Add New Language (below Rotor Languages), then choose a language. Have VoiceOver confirm rotor actions: Tap Verbosity, then turn on Speak Confirmation.
